```{css, echo=FALSE}
html {
  position: relative;
  min-height: 100%;
}

  margin-bottom: 40px;
}
.footer {
  position: absolute;
  bottom: 0;
  width: 100%;
  height: 80px;
  padding: 20px 0;
  background-color: #2c3e50;
  text-align: center;
}
body{margin-top:20px;}

    margin: 0 0 22px;
    padding: 0;
}
.cd-schedule__group > ul {
  position: relative;
  padding: 0 var(--component-padding);
  display: flex;
  overflow-x: scroll;
  -webkit-overflow-scrolling: touch;
}

```

```{js, echo=FALSE}

  $('.main-container').after($('.footer'));
})

```
